data.title: King Farouk in Exile with family
data.meta_description: March 1953 --- Egypt's deposed King Farouk, who was ousted in a surprise Army Coup, poses with his family here on the Isle of Capri, where the ex-ruler is in exile.  Left to right are Princess Feraal, 14; Queen Narriman; Farouk holding baby son Faud II, the new King of Egypt; Princess Fadia, 9; and Princess Fawzia, 12.  The three princesses are by Farouk's first wife.  The ousted king took up residence on the same Italian isle on which he spent his honeymoon last year. --- Image by © Bettmann/CORBIS
data.text: March 1953 --- Egypt's deposed King Farouk, who was ousted in a surprise Army Coup, poses with his family here on the Isle of Capri, where the ex-ruler is in exile. Left to right are Princess Feraal, 14; Queen Narriman; Farouk holding baby son Faud II, the new King of Egypt; Princess Fadia, 9; and Princess Fawzia, 12. The three princesses are by Farouk's first wife. The ousted king took up residence on the same Italian isle on which he spent his honeymoon last year. --- Image by © Bettmann/CORBIS
